# semaphoreui_project_integration_matcher (Data Source)

The project integration matcher data source allows you to read an existing integration matcher.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Lookup by Matcher ID
data "semaphoreui_project_integration_matcher" "matcher" {
  project_id     = 1
  integration_id = 2
  id             = 3
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) The matcher ID.
- `integration_id` (Number) The integration ID that this matcher belongs to.
- `project_id` (Number) The project ID that the integration belongs to.

### Read-Only

- `body_data_type` (String) The data type of the body. Valid values are `json`, `xml`, or `string`.
- `key` (String) The key to match against.
- `match_type` (String) Where to look for the value. Valid values are `body` or `header`.
- `method` (String) The comparison method. Valid values are `equals`, `unequals`, or `contains`.
- `name` (String) The display name of the matcher.
- `value` (String) The value to match against.
